title: Personal Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website built with React JS, showcasing my professional journey and creative work. It features my introduction, a collection of projects, detailed work experience, the tools & technologies I use, and links to my blogs and social media.

title: 3D Model Viewer and Editor
description: An interactive 3D Model Viewer built with React.js and Babylon.js, allowing users to upload 3D models, explore their meshes, adjust material properties, and customize the environment for an immersive viewing experience
